name: WooCommerce Product Slider
author: themesCode

sections.description:
Woocommerce Product Slider Carousel is an easy product slider plugin to add Woocommerce Product slider and carousel in wordpress sites.This plugin is responsive and works using shortcode .This plugin works based on Woocommerce plugin. It is easy to works with TC Product Slider plugin . just use the shortcode in any page/post where you want to display slider carousel of your products.

  • Upgrade To Pro »
  • View live Demos »
  • Documentations »
  • Support »
  • Send Message On Facebook »

Woocommerce Product Slider Plugin Free Features:

  • Easy installable
  • Fully Responsive.
  • Supported all Modern browsers
  • Powered By OWL carousel .
  • Work with all WordPress theme.
  • Developer friendly & easy to customize.
  • Carousel for Recent Products
  • Carousel for Featured Products
  • Shortcode Ready
  • Setting Panel
  • Pagination color is changeable from Setting Panel
  • Navigational background color change options in the Setting Panel.
  • Cart button background color,font color, hover background color change options in the Setting Panel.
  • Pirce button color change options .
  • Items Number is changeable for Large desktop , Medium Desktop screen , Tabs .
  • Autoplay , Auto Height and Stop On Hover is manageable .
  • Navigation , Pagination and Pagination Number can be off/on .
  • Limit the number of words shows on hover overlay.
  • Shows Star Rating.
  • Shows Short Description on Hover.
  • You can Hide/Show Star Rating,Short Description.
  • Smooth box shadow on Hover.

Watch the video tutorial (free version)

Woocommerce Product Slider Pro version Features:

  • Advanced settings panel.
  • Shortcode Generator.
  • Carousel for Recent/Latest Products.
  • Carousel for Featured Products.
  • Show Carousel from one or more specific products categories.
  • Show Carousel from On Sale Product.
  • Two Different Layout Style.
  • Quick view / Lightbox effect available.
  • 5 Nice Image Hover Effects for specific layout style.
  • 7 Different Navigation Style and Position.

Basic Shortcode – Show Latest Products 

[tc-latest-product]

Basic Shortcode – Show Featured Products 

[tc-featured-product]

Upgrade to Premium Now !
sections.installation:
Installing TC Woocommerce Product Slider is easy like a regular WordPress plugin. Here goes the step by step Guide to Install TC Woocommerce Product Slider plugin :

Watch the video tutorial (free version)

Basic Shortcode – Show Latest Products 

[tc-latest-product]

Basic Shortcode – Show Featured Products 

[tc-featured-product]

Install Plugin using WordPress Admin Panel Search Option

  • In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  • Search TC Woocommerce Product Slider
  • Click to install
  • Activate the plugin

Install Plugin using Upload Method in WordPress Admin Panel

  • Download the latest version of TC Woocommerce Product Slider (.zip file)
  • In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  • click on the Upload Tab
  • Click on “Choose File from your Hard Disk”
  • Browse and Select downloaded tc-woocommerce-product-slider.zip & click on ‘Install Now’ button
  • Activate the plugin

Install Plugin using FTP Manager

  • Upload TC Woocommerce Product Slider folder with all files inside the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Go to WordPress dashboard > Plugins & Activate the TC Woocommerce Product Slider plugin
sections.changelog:
version 1.5

  • Query updated for Latest Product
  • Query updated for Featured Product

version 1.4.1

*Shows Star Rating.
*Shows Short Description on Hover.
*Limit the number of words shows on hover overlay.
*You can Hide/Show Star Rating,Short Description.
*Smooth box shadow on Hover.

version 1.4

image loading issue solved
carousel updated

version 1.3

  • Plugin’s design updated.
  • overlay effect added

version 1.2

  • Setting Panel added

version 1.1

  • Featured Products carousel Added
  • Shordcode changed to [tc-latest-product]

version 1.0

  • Initial release
